segments.text: I see this kitchen with a woman drying a plate by the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is running full blast from the faucet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's overflowing everywhere, pouring over the edge.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There's a big puddle forming on the floor right at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She doesn't even notice; she's just focused on that dish.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Over to the left, there's a boy climbing on a stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks like it's about to tip over any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching into the cookie jar up in the cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A little girl is standing there with her hand out, waiting for one.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They seem so sneaky, like they're not supposed to be doing this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window shows a nice garden outside, all calm and pretty.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But inside, it's chaos waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR
